Reviews.Title: Really useful
Reviews.Author: Ian Abercrombie "IanAber"
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera to look down a long pipe. It works perfectly once attached to something you can use to thread it into the pipe with. I taped it to a length of 1/2" PEX which is stiff enough to push the camera down the pipe with but flexible enough to go round bends. The camera plugged directly into me Macbook and can be viewed in Photo Booth with not drivers or additional software. Works great and at an unbeatable price. Shipping was very fast too!

Reviews.Title: Beats Home Depot's one meter cabled camera all to heck
Reviews.Author: Matt Szczepkowski
Reviews.Content: Great buy considering Home Depot has a one meter length version of this with a camera attached for 99 dollars. That one meter of length won't do you much good when the blockage is twenty feet up the pipe! Think before you waste your money on a short cabled camera you don't even need, this USB camera works great and is fifty feet long!

Reviews.Title: work for me
Reviews.Author: jeff
Reviews.Content: works just as all the other positive reviews stated. I bought this camera for a automotive project instead of a hand held inspection unit. now i have the dirversity to inspect plumbing and air conditioning vents,,, I also bought the wire puller for use in the future.

Reviews.Title: Good
Reviews.Author: bigjohny500000
Reviews.Content: Was very iffy about this but once I have gotten it and, hooked it to my computer it was somewhat imppresive lights up well and good camera, I would reccomend it to anyone looking for something in this category !

Reviews.Title: INSPECTION CAMERA
Reviews.Author: Gman
Reviews.Content: very affordable for the do it your self home owner.  convenient and easy.  just plug in to your usb port and away you go.  it is not super high resolution but adequate for inspection of pipes and plumbing type things. highly recommend.  good product.

Reviews.Title: the way to check into your vents.
Reviews.Author: Ahmed M.
Reviews.Content: My son trew a lot of stuff into some ground vents. This is what I ve used to look in there and find out how much stuff I was to get out and if a little fetching is going to do or if I had to make a hole into the drywall

Reviews.Title: Its OK
Reviews.Author: danielrcaldwell
Reviews.Content: I got this and did not feel very confident from the appearance on either side of the cable, that water would not immediately penetrate and cause issues. Quality is decent, Software....not really robust..but to veiw it..it works.I would look at something maybe about twice the cost of this if the integrated software and quality were better.

Reviews.Title: Great idea, poor execution
Reviews.Author: Daniel Nica
Reviews.Content: I liked the idea of being able to see what's blocking the pipe. The camera worked when i tested it first in my office but stopped working as i started to push it down the pipe (connected to a snake). Given the environment it is built for, needs to be much sturdier.

Reviews.Title: Excellent quality
Reviews.Author: CEN
Reviews.Content: This s an excellent quality product. Very well made with sturdy and strong materials. The camera housing is brass. The whole unit is watertight sealed. I purchased this camera to locate an object causing blockages in the main sewer of the house. The camera is easily secured to a drain snake (waterproof tape) and will no doubt save me a small fortune. The cost of bringing in a plumber to do the same job would be in the hundreds of dollars.

Reviews.Title: Well it's cheap
Reviews.Author: Engineer4G
Reviews.Content: Looked good under the xmas tree but:Software is just MS video capture DEMO ver,Ran into a water filled pipe and wire entry to brass CCD housing separated allowing water into CCD housing front lens protector fogged blurring picture. End of usage.  The glue bond to the brass housing was defective.  it is 1/10 the price of a Bosch or Dewalt pro unit -not for wet environment.

Reviews.Title: Not Waterproof
Reviews.Author: macspacedog
Reviews.Content: The cable has a box with a circuit board in the middle of the cable making it useless for pipes longer than about 20 feet.  Mine got wet the first time I used it and it stopped working.  I wasted my money.

Reviews.Title: faulty instructions
Reviews.Author: todd
Reviews.Content: The instructions state "COPY" the cd to your computer. GOOD LUCK. I could only save it to the PC with a "COMPRESSED ZIP FOLDER", and I have no idea what that is, but it works. Right click on "OPEN" to get there. If you don't do this the cd must be in the drive for camera to work.

Reviews.Title: defective product
Reviews.Author: Pedro Bengochea
Reviews.Content: This product is defective, moving the cable, the computer fails to recognize, is disconnected and can not see any image, then move the cable to the computer recognizes it again, I've tried on several pc and laptops and all presents the same fault.

Reviews.Title: Limited duribility!
Reviews.Author: S&S
Reviews.Content: Used it to inspect the sewer line that was giving us a problem.  It seemed to work great but failed completely the 2nd time I used it.  Attached it to a clean-out cable that would go around curves nicely and the lights on the camera did a good job.  I captured the video as it moved down the pipe.  Ive tried everything I know of to view the video, however, nothing works.  Now when I try to use the camera I get a message, "No video capture hardware available."

Reviews.Title: Doesn't really work well.
Reviews.Author: Sinan Ussakli
Reviews.Content: Camera only has focus for few inches, overall picture quality is very bad, the cord is just a normal chord. you cannot push it, it doesn't have the firmness to be pushed in.

Reviews.Title: NO GOOOD
Reviews.Author: armando guardado
Reviews.Content: THIS IS NO GOOD  CULITY CAM  TERREBLE CABLE TO LONG  IT DAS NOT WORK FOR ME SORRY NOT BUY  AGAME

ProductInfo.Features:
15M/50ft WATER PROOF SEWER PIPE DRAIN CLEANER INSPECTION CAMERA
High resolution with 1/6 CMOS camera
4 LED lux luminance lights can work better when the light very dark
Can record video, and save the video in the PC
This portable Digital Microscope must be connected to the computer when using.
ProductInfo.Name: AGPtek® 15m 50ft USB Cable Waterproof Drain Pipe Pipeline Snake camera Inspection
